verses.kjv: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
verses.web: But concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need that anything be written to you.
verses.ct: Now brothers, you don't need me to write to you about when these things will happen or what the timing will look like.

verses.kjv: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
verses.web: For you yourselves know well that the day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night.
verses.ct: You already know perfectly well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.

verses.kjv: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
verses.web: For when they are saying, “Peace and safety,” then sudden destruction will come on them, like birth pains on a pregnant woman. Then they will in no way escape.
verses.ct: While people are saying, "Everything is peaceful and safe," sudden destruction will hit them — like labor pains striking a pregnant woman. There will be no escape.

verses.kjv: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
verses.web: But you, brothers, aren’t in darkness, that the day should overtake you like a thief.
verses.ct: But you, brothers, aren't living in darkness, so that day won't catch you off guard like a thief.

verses.kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
verses.web: You are all children of light and children of the day. We don’t belong to the night, nor to darkness,
verses.ct: All of you are children of light, children of the day. We don't belong to the night or to darkness.

verses.kjv: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
verses.web: so then let’s not sleep, as the rest do, but let’s watch and be sober.
verses.ct: So let's not fall asleep like everyone else. Instead, let's stay alert and clear-headed.

verses.kjv: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
verses.web: For those who sleep, sleep in the night; and those who are drunk are drunk in the night.
verses.ct: People who sleep do it at night, and people who get drunk do it at night.

verses.kjv: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
verses.web: But since we belong to the day, let’s be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and for a helmet, the hope of salvation.
verses.ct: But since we belong to the day, let's stay sober, wearing faith and love as a breastplate, and the hope of salvation as a helmet.

verses.kjv: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.web: For God didn’t appoint us to wrath, but to the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.ct: God didn't choose us to face his wrath — he chose us to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.kjv: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
verses.web: who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
verses.ct: who died for us so that whether we're alive or dead when he returns, we will live together with him.

verses.kjv: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
verses.web: Therefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as you also do.
verses.ct: So encourage each other and build one another up — just as you're already doing.

verses.kjv: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
verses.web: But we beg you, brothers, to know those who labor among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you,
verses.ct: Brothers, we ask you to recognize those who work hard among you, who lead you in the Lord and correct you when needed.

verses.kjv: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
verses.web: and to respect and honor them in love for their work’s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.
verses.ct: Hold them in the highest regard and love them because of the work they do. Live at peace with one another.

verses.kjv: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
verses.web: We exhort you, brothers: Admonish the disorderly; encourage the faint-hearted; support the weak; be patient toward all.
verses.ct: We urge you, brothers: warn those who are out of line, encourage the discouraged, help the weak, and be patient with everyone.

verses.kjv: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
verses.web: See that no one returns evil for evil to anyone, but always follow after that which is good for one another and for all.
verses.ct: Make sure no one pays back evil with evil. Instead, always pursue what is good — for each other and for everyone.

verses.kjv: Rejoice evermore.
verses.web: Always rejoice.
verses.ct: Rejoice always.

verses.kjv: Pray without ceasing.
verses.web: Pray without ceasing.
verses.ct: Pray without ceasing.

verses.kjv: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
verses.web: In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you.
verses.ct: Give thanks in every situation, because this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: Quench not the Spirit.
verses.web: Don’t quench the Spirit.
verses.ct: Don't put out the Spirit's fire.

verses.kjv: Despise not prophesyings.
verses.web: Don’t despise prophecies.
verses.ct: Don't dismiss prophecies.

verses.kjv: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
verses.web: Test all things, and hold firmly that which is good.
verses.ct: Test everything and hold on to what is good.

verses.kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
verses.web: Abstain from every form of evil.
verses.ct: Stay away from every form of evil.

verses.kjv: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.web: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: May the God of peace himself make you completely holy. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be kept blameless until the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
verses.web: He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
verses.ct: The one who calls you is faithful, and he will do it.

verses.kjv: Brethren, pray for us.
verses.web: Brothers, pray for us.
verses.ct: Brothers, pray for us.

verses.kjv: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
verses.web: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.
verses.ct: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.

verses.kjv: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
verses.web: I solemnly command you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.
verses.ct: I solemnly charge you in the Lord's name: have this letter read to all the brothers.

verses.kjv: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
verses.web: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
verses.ct: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
